title: 2008년 Paul Davila v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Paul Davila v. State. 판결일: 2008-08-21. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Paul Davila v. State
**판결일**: 2008-08-21
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약








TEXAS COURT OF APPEALS, THIRD DISTRICT, AT AUSTIN






NO. 03-08-00438-CR






Paul Davila, Appellant



v.



The State of Texas, Appellee






FROM THE DISTRICT COURT OF TRAVIS COUNTY, 390TH JUDICIAL DISTRICT


NO. D-1-DC-07-302771, HONORABLE JULIE H. KOCUREK, JUDGE PRESIDING






M E M O R A N D U M   O P I N I O N



Paul Davila seeks to appeal a judgment of conviction for assault with family violence. 
The trial court has certified that:  (1) this is a plea bargain case and Davila has no right of appeal, and
(2) Davila waived the right of appeal.  The appeal is dismissed.  See Tex. R. App. P. 25.2(a)(2), (d).



				___________________________________________

				Jan P. Patterson, Justice

Before Justices Patterson, Waldrop and Henson

Dismissed for Want of Jurisdiction

Filed:   August 21, 2008

Do Not Publish


...
